meanings.definition: Having a prominent or exaggerated chest
meanings.sent1: The bodybuilder had the chestiest muscles in the gym.
meanings.sent2: She wore the chestiest outfit to show off her physique.
meanings.sent3: The superhero's chestiest costume made villains tremble.
meanings.sent4: His chestiest pose in the mirror reflected his hard work at the gym.
meanings.sent5: The chestiest tree in the forest stood tall and proud.

meanings.definition: Showing excessive pride or arrogance in one's chest
meanings.sent1: The chestiest student boasted about his perfect test score.
meanings.sent2: Her chestiest attitude rubbed her classmates the wrong way.
meanings.sent3: The chestiest peacock strutted around the farmyard.
meanings.sent4: His chestiest speech offended many in the audience.
meanings.sent5: The chestiest king in the land demanded constant praise.
meanings.sent6: With his chestiest grin, he accepted the award for his achievements.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to the chest
meanings.sent1: The chestiest X-ray showed a fracture in the ribcage.
meanings.sent2: She bought the chestiest medicine to soothe her cough.
meanings.sent3: The chestiest doctor in the hospital specialized in heart surgeries.
meanings.sent4: His chestiest injury was a result of a fall during the race.
meanings.sent5: The chestiest pain he felt was a sharp stabbing sensation.
